content: Hardware System Area (HSA): Standard 256 GB of addressable memory for system use outside of customer memory.  Standard: Provides minimum physical memory that is required to hold customer purchase memory plus 256 GB HSA.  Flexible: Provides more physical memory that is needed to support that activation of base customer memory and HSA on a multiple CPC drawer IBM z16 with one drawer out of service (concurrent drawer replacement; not available on Max39 feature). The memory granularity, which is based on the installed customer memory, is listed in Table 2-7. Table 2-7 Customer offering memory increments Note: IBM z16 with Bulk Power Adapter option can be configured with only 5 TB of memory per CPC drawer (BPA systems maximum memory is 20 TB).
